about_the_game:
Audio Aura is an innovative application designed for those who love listening to music. This app transforms any song or sound into a captivating visual experience.

With Audio Aura, you can enjoy music turned into waves dancing along the edges of the screen, responding in real-time to the music you're listening to. These waves represent the audio spectrum, with their colors changing according to the rhythm and intensity of the sound. By default, the waves glow in bright RGB colors, but you can easily customize them, altering the colors or any other settings to match your mood or style.

Whether you're listening personally or using Audio Aura as a tool for DJing, this app is an affordable and easy-to-use software. Even on lower-spec computers, you won't encounter any performance issues.

To use Audio Aura, simply play music using any application on your computer, and you will immediately see the lights reacting to the sound, creating a unique and enchanting visual experience.

So, if you want to transform music into an immersive visual experience, download Audio Aura now and get ready for an amazing visual feast!
